fields.description: Reset open-drain fault output if there are no active faults in the system. Note that this bit is write-only. Any reads of this register return 0 in the FPINRST bit location. 0 = Do not care, 1 = Reset open-drain fault output.
fields.name: FPINRST

fields.description: PWM phase shift setting for internal PWM generator.

digital_physical_map.0: 180 deg phase shift between internally generated PWM signals
digital_physical_map.1: 0 deg phase shift between internally generated PWM signals

fields.name: PWMPH

fields.description: Software limp-home mode. The limp-home mode can be activated by writing to the register. The bit is also set high in case of communication failure. The bit has to be written to zero to return to normal operation.

digital_physical_map.1: Operation in limp-home state

fields.name: LHSW

fields.description: Communication watch dog timer enable.

digital_physical_map.1: Enable communication watch dog timer

fields.name: CMWEN

fields.description: This bit is used to enable internal PWM generator function for channel 2. UDIM2 input must be above V_UDIM2(UVLO).

digital_physical_map.0: LED current duty cycle of channel 2 controlled by the external signal connected to UDIM2 input
digital_physical_map.1: LED current duty cycle of channel 2 controlled by the internal PWM generator (registers PWMDIV and CH2PWM)

fields.name: CH2INTPWM

fields.description: CH2 enable. This bit controls the operation of channel 2.

digital_physical_map.1: Enable LED channel 2

fields.name: CH2EN

fields.description: This bit is used to enable internal PWM generator function for channel 1. UDIM1 input must be above V_UDIM1(UVLO).

digital_physical_map.0: LED current duty cycle of channel 1 controlled by external signal connected to UDIM1 input
digital_physical_map.1: LED current duty cycle of channel 1 controlled by internal PWM generator (registers PWMDIV and CH1PWM)

fields.name: CH1INTPWM

fields.description: CH1 enable. This bit controls the operation of channel 1.

digital_physical_map.1: Enable LED channel 1

fields.name: CH1EN

fields.description: IFT sets the counter limit for the fault timer.

digital_physical_map.1: 7.2 ms fault timer

fields.name: IFT

fields.description: Reserved bit.
fields.name: SYSCFG2_RESERVED_5

fields.description: Channel 2 thermal shutdown fault response.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 2 auto-restarts based on internal temperature hysteresis.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 2 is latched off; CH2EN bit is reset and channel 2 is disabled until the CH2EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: CH2TSFL

fields.description: Channel 2 high-side FET current limit fault response.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 2 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 2 is latched off; CH2EN bit is reset and channel 2 is disabled until the CH2EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: CH2HSILIMFL

fields.description: Channel 2 low-side FET current limit fault response.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 2 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 2 is latched off; CH2EN bit is reset and channel 2 is disabled until the CH2EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: CH2LSILIMFL

fields.description: Channel 1 thermal shutdown fault response.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 1 auto-restarts based on internal temperature hysteresis.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 1 is latched off; CH1EN bit is reset and channel 1 is disabled until the CH1EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: CH1TSFL

fields.description: Channel 1 high side FET current limit fault response.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 1 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 1 is latched off; CH1EN bit is reset and channel 1 is disabled until the CH1EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: CH1HSILIMFL

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CMWTAP_RESERVED_7_4

fields.description: Mapping of CMWTAP bits to the tap points for the communication watchdog timer.

digital_physical_map.0: Tap point set to bit 16 corresponding to 6.1 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.1: Tap point set to bit 17 corresponding to 12.1 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.10: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.11: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.12: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.13: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.14: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.15: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.2: Tap point set to bit 18 corresponding to 24.3 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.3: Tap point set to bit 19 corresponding to 48.5 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.4: Tap point set to bit 20 corresponding to 97.1 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.5: Tap point set to bit 21 corresponding to 194.2 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.6: Tap point set to bit 22 corresponding to 388.3 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.7: Tap point set to bit 23 corresponding to 776.7 ms (typical) watch dog period.
digital_physical_map.8: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.
digital_physical_map.9: Tap point set to bit 24 corresponding to 1.52 s (typical) watchdog period.

fields.name: CMWTAP

fields.description: Indicates low-side switch current limit fault on channel 2. Low-side switch current is greater than 1.5 A (typical). Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2LSILIM

fields.description: Indicates high-side switch current limit fault on channel 2. High-side switch current is greater than 2.7 A (typical). Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2HSILIM

fields.description: Indicates output short circuit fault on channel 2. CSP pin voltage is below 2.45 V. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2SHORT

fields.description: Indicates overvoltage condition on COMP2 pin. COMP2 pin voltage is greater than 3.2 V. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2COMPOV

fields.description: Indicates low-side switch current limit fault on channel 1. Low-side switch current is greater than 1.5 A (typical). Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1LSILIM

fields.description: Indicates high-side switch current limit fault on channel 1. High-side switch current is greater than 2.7 A (typical). Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1HSILIM

fields.description: Indicates output short circuit fault on channel 1. CSP pin voltage is below 2.45 V. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1SHORT

fields.description: Indicates overvoltage condition on COMP1 pin. COMP1 pin voltage is greater than 3.2 V. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1COMPOV

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: STATUS2_RESERVED_7_6

fields.description: Indicates overtemperature thermal protection for channel 2. The channel automatically restarts when the bit is cleared to 0. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2TP

fields.description: Indicates bootstrap undervoltage fault condition on channel 2. BST2 pin voltage is less than 2.95 V. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2BSTUV

fields.description: Indicates channel 2 operation at maximum duty cycle. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2TOFFMIN

fields.description: Indicates overtemperature thermal protection for channel 1. The channel automatically restarts when the bit is cleared to 0. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1TP

fields.description: Indicates bootstrap undervoltage fault condition on channel 1. BST1 pin voltage is less than 2.95 V. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1BSTUV

fields.description: Indicates channel 1 operation at maximum duty cycle. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1TOFFMIN

fields.description: Indicates standalone mode. This bit can be cleared by issuing the RESET or DETECT command (see RESET register). Read-only.
fields.name: STANDALONE

fields.description: Indicates V5A undervoltage fault condition. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: V5AUV

fields.description: Indicates the number of times the communication watchdog timer has expired. Read-to-clear.

digital_physical_map.1: Watchdog has expired 1 time.
digital_physical_map.3: Watchdog has expired 3 times. Device transitions into limp-home mode.

fields.name: CMWTO

fields.description: Indicates overtemperature thermal warning. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: TW

fields.description: Power cycle bit is set at power up (reset value is 1) and is considered a fault. The PC bit must be cleared before the channels can be enabled. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: PC

fields.description: Logic OR of the fault bits for channel 2 excluding over temperature thermal warning. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH2STATUS

fields.description: Logic OR of the fault bits for channel 1 excluding over temperature thermal warning. Read-to-clear.
fields.name: CH1STATUS

fields.description: TWLMT[9:2] sets the Thermal Warning (TW) bit when the most significant 8 bits of the ADC reading of the TEMP value exceed the programmed value. The default value is 138 decimal, or 0x8Ah (corresponding to a temperature of 125 C). This register holds bits [9:2] of the 10-bit threshold.
fields.name: TWLMT

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: SLEEP_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Device sleep mode. The low-power sleep mode can be activated by writing to the register.

digital_physical_map.0: Exit sleep mode and return to normal operation (SLEEP OFF).
digital_physical_map.1: Enter sleep mode (SLEEP ON).

fields.name: SLEEP

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CH1IADJL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 1 analog current control. 10-bit value set via CH1IADJL and CH1IADJH registers. Sets LED current based on Equation 5: I_LED = (V_DAC(FS) * value) / (14336 * R_CS) A, where V_DAC(FS) is typically 2.45V and R_CS is the external sense resistor.
fields.name: CH1IADJ

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CH2IADJL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 2 analog current control. 10-bit value set via CH2IADJL and CH2IADJH registers. Sets LED current based on Equation 5: I_LED = (V_DAC(FS) * value) / (14336 * R_CS) A, where V_DAC(FS) is typically 2.45V and R_CS is the external sense resistor.
fields.name: CH2IADJ

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: PWMDIV_RESERVED_7_3

fields.description: This 3-bit value selects the clock divider for the internal PWM generator. The PWM clock is derived based on typical oscillator frequency of 10.8 MHz. PWM Frequency = (10.8 MHz / Divisor) / 1024.

digital_physical_map.1: Divide oscillator clock by 8 (f_PWM = 1318 Hz)

fields.name: PWMDIV

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CH1PWMH_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 1 PWM width control. 10-bit value set via CH1PWML and CH1PWMH registers. Sets internal PWM duty cycle. Duty Cycle = value / 1024.
fields.name: CH1PWM

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CH2PWMH_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 2 PWM width control. 10-bit value set via CH2PWML and CH2PWMH registers. Sets internal PWM duty cycle. Duty Cycle = value / 1024.
fields.name: CH2PWM

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CH1TON_RESERVED_7_6

fields.description: Channel 1 on-time control. The pseudo-fixed switching frequency for channel 1 is set by writing to this register. Default value (7) is set to ensure 437-kHz switching frequency. Equation 3: f_SW = (value + 1) / ((4e-8 * (value + 1)) + 18e-6) Hz.
fields.name: CH1TON

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: CH2TON_RESERVED_7_6

fields.description: Channel 2 on-time control. The pseudo-fixed switching frequency for channel 2 is set by writing to this register. Default value (7) is set to ensure 437 kHz switching frequency. Equation 3: f_SW = (value + 1) / ((4e-8 * (value + 1)) + 18e-6) Hz.
fields.name: CH2TON

fields.description: ADC measurement of the drain voltage node for channel 1. The VIN1 pin voltage is internally attenuated by 0.037. V_IN1 = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH1VIN_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the CSN1 node for channel 1. The CSN1 pin voltage is internally attenuated by 0.037. V_CSN1 = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH1VLED_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the CSN1 node for channel 1 before falling edge of PWM signal. V_CSN1_ON = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH1VLEDON_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the CSN1 node for channel 1 before rising edge of PWM signal. V_CSN1_OFF = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH1VLEDOFF_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the drain voltage node for channel 2. The VIN2 pin voltage is internally attenuated by 0.037. V_IN2 = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH2VIN_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the CSN2 node for channel 2. The CSN2 pin voltage is internally attenuated by 0.037. V_CSN2 = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH2VLED_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the CSN2 node for channel 2 before falling edge of PWM signal. V_CSN2_ON = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH2VLEDON_ADC

fields.description: ADC measurement of the CSN2 node for channel 2 before rising edge of PWM signal. V_CSN2_OFF = value * (65.0 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: CH2VLEDOFF_ADC

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: TEMPL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: ADC measurement of the junction temperature. 10-bit value read from TEMPL and TEMPH registers (TEMPL must be read first). Equation 13: TJ = (0.7168 * value) - 271.51 C.
fields.name: TEMP

fields.description: ADC measurement of the 5-V bias supply (V5D pin). The V5D pin voltage is internally attenuated by 0.45. V5D = value * (5.33 / 255.0) V.
fields.name: V5D_ADC

fields.description: PWM phase shift setting for internal PWM generator in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: 180 deg phase shift between internally-generated PWM signals
digital_physical_map.1: 0 deg phase shift between internally generated PWM signals

fields.name: LHPWMPH

fields.description: This bit is used to select between internal or external current reference set point in limp-home mode. The external reference is set by voltage on LHI pin.

digital_physical_map.0: Use internal LHxIADJ register as the CHxIADJ setting in limp-home mode.
digital_physical_map.1: Use external LHI reference (ADC value) as the CHxIADJ setting in limp-home mode.

fields.name: LHEXTIADJ

fields.description: Set channel 2 PWM duty cycle to 100% in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: LED current duty cycle based on internal or external command
digital_physical_map.1: LED current duty cycle set to 100%

fields.name: LH2100D

fields.description: This bit is used to enable internal PWM generator function for channel 2 in limp- home mode. UDIM2 input must be above V_UDIM2(UVLO) threshold.

digital_physical_map.0: LED current duty cycle of channel 2 controlled by an external signal connected to UDIM2 input
digital_physical_map.1: LED current duty cycle of channel 2 controlled by an internal PWM generator (registers PWMDIV and LH2PWM).

fields.name: LH2INTPWM

fields.description: CH2 enable. This bit controls the operation of channel 2 in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.1: Enable LED channel 2.

fields.name: LH2EN

fields.description: Set channel 1 PWM duty cycle to 100% in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: LED current duty cycle based on internal or external command
digital_physical_map.1: LED current duty cycle set to 100%

fields.name: LH1100D

fields.description: This bit is used to enable internal PWM generator function for channel 1 in limp- home mode. UDIM1 input must be above V_UDIM1(UVLO) threshold.

digital_physical_map.0: LED current duty cycle of channel 1 controlled by external signal connected to UDIM1 input
digital_physical_map.1: LED current duty cycle of channel 1 controlled by internal PWM generator (registers PWMDIV and LH1PWM).

fields.name: LH1INTPWM

fields.description: CH1 enable. This bit controls the operation of channel 1 in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.1: Enable LED channel 1.

fields.name: LH1EN

fields.description: LHIFT sets the counter limit for the ILIM fault timer in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.1: 7.2 ms fault timer

fields.name: LHIFT

fields.description: Channel 2 thermal shutdown fault response in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 2 auto-restarts based on internal temperature hysteresis.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 2 is latched off; CH2EN bit is reset and channel 2 is disabled until the CH2EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: LH2TSFL

fields.description: Channel 2 high-side FET current limit fault response in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 2 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 2 is latched off; CH2EN bit is reset and channel 2 is disabled until the CH2EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: LH2HSILIMFL

fields.description: Channel 2 low-side FET current limit fault response in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 2 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 2 is latched off; CH2EN bit is reset and channel 2 is disabled until the CH2EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: LH2LSILIMFL

fields.description: Channel 1 thermal shutdown fault response in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 1 auto-restarts based on internal temperature hysteresis.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 1 is latched off; CH1EN bit is reset and channel 1 is disabled until the CH1EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: LH1TSFL

fields.description: Channel 1 high-side FET current limit fault response in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 1 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 1 is latched off; CH1EN bit is reset and channel 1 is disabled until the CH1EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: LH1HSILIMFL

fields.description: Channel 1 low-side FET current limit fault response in limp-home mode.

digital_physical_map.0: Channel 1 auto-restarts after the ILIM fault timer has expired.
digital_physical_map.1: Channel 1 is latched off; CH1EN bit is reset and channel 1 is disabled until the CH1EN bit is programmed high by SPI command.

fields.name: LH1LSILIMFL

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LHIL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: External current reference set point in limp-home mode (ADC reading). The LHI input voltage is digitized to achieve a 10-bit reference with resolution of 2.45/1023 (V/dec). V_LHI = value * (2.45 / 1023.0) V. If LHEXTIADJ=1, this value sets the LED current.
fields.name: LHI_ADC

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LHIFILTL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Filtered ADC measurement of LHI input. The register reports the 10-bit low-pass filtered LHI input voltage. Read LHIFILTH first, then LHIFILTL. V_LHI_filt = value * (2.45 / 1023.0) V.
fields.name: LHIFILT_ADC

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LH1IADJL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 1 analog current control in limp-home mode. 10-bit value set via LH1IADJL and LH1IADJH registers. Sets LED current based on Equation 5: I_LED = (V_DAC(FS) * value) / (14336 * R_CS) A, where V_DAC(FS) is typically 2.45V and R_CS is the external sense resistor. Used if LHEXTIADJ=0.
fields.name: LH1IADJ

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LH2IADJL_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 2 analog current control in limp-home mode. 10-bit value set via LH2IADJL and LH2IADJH registers. Sets LED current based on Equation 5: I_LED = (V_DAC(FS) * value) / (14336 * R_CS) A, where V_DAC(FS) is typically 2.45V and R_CS is the external sense resistor. Used if LHEXTIADJ=0.
fields.name: LH2IADJ

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LH1PWMH_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 1 PWM width control in limp-home mode. 10-bit value set via LH1PWML and LH1PWMH registers. Sets internal PWM duty cycle. Duty Cycle = value / 1024.
fields.name: LH1PWM

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LH2PWMH_RESERVED_7_2

fields.description: Channel 2 PWM width control in limp-home mode. 10-bit value set via LH2PWML and LH2PWMH registers. Sets internal PWM duty cycle. Duty Cycle = value / 1024.
fields.name: LH2PWM

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LH1TON_RESERVED_7_6

fields.description: Channel 1 on-time control in limp-home mode. The pseudo-fixed switching frequency for channel 1 is set by writing to this register. Default value (7) is set to ensure 437-kHz switching frequency. Equation 3: f_SW = (value + 1) / ((4e-8 * (value + 1)) + 18e-6) Hz.
fields.name: LH1TON

fields.description: Reserved bits.
fields.name: LH2TON_RESERVED_7_6

fields.description: Channel 2 on-time control in limp-home mode. The pseudo-fixed switching frequency for channel 2 is set by writing to this register. Default value (7) is set to ensure 437-kHz switching frequency. Equation 3: f_SW = (value + 1) / ((4e-8 * (value + 1)) + 18e-6) Hz.
fields.name: LH2TON

fields.description: Write 0xC3 to reset all writable registers to their default values and return state machines to LOAD state (watchdog disabled). Write 0xD4 to reset all writable registers to default and return state machines to DETECT state (watchdog enabled, requires STATUS3 read first if in standalone). This register is write-only.

digital_physical_map.195: Reset to default values, state machine -> LOAD, watchdog disabled.
digital_physical_map.212: Reset to default values, state machine -> DETECT, watchdog enabled.

fields.name: RESET
